title: card.motion Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Returns information about the Notecard accelerometer's motion and orientation. Motion tracking must be enabled first with `card.motion.mode`. Otherwise, this request will return `{}`.

minutes.description: Amount of time to sample for buckets of accelerometer-measured movement. For instance, `5` will sample motion events for the previous five minutes and return a `movements` string with motion counts in each bucket.

samples.title: Motion with Minutes Sampling
samples.description: Request motion information with 2-minute sampling buckets.
